rows.label: qev027104_MSG0001
rows.name: Is there any sign of public support for the Orphe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0002
rows.name:
If sufficient support exists, we will volunteer to represent
the city's xenoform citizens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0003
rows.name:
You may think our hesitation cowardly, but we
view it simply as being cautious in the face of a
large-scale undertaking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0004
rows.name: I have eagerly awaited your return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0005
rows.name: What did the people have to say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0006
rows.name: ...Truly? They hold us in such high regard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0008
rows.name:
To back away now would be an insult to those
who placed their faith in us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0009
rows.name:
And an insult to you as well, considering how much
support you offered at every stage in the process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0010
rows.name:
We will not let those efforts go to waste.
We will match them with our own![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0012
rows.name:
We shall strive to do our best to fairly represent all of
our fellow xenoform citizens of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0013
rows.name: ...Assuming an Orphean is elected, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0014
rows.name:
And we will also dedicate ourselves completely to
this campaign, beginning today![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0015
rows.name:
We seek only a brighter future for all races.
Humans included.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027104_MSG0016
rows.name:
I swear to you, the Orphe shall spare no effort in
achieving this vision.[ST:wait ]
